text: Budhathoki () is a surname of Ekthariya (single-clan) Chhetri group of Khas community of Nepal and Indigenous community of Magar community. People with Budhathoki surname reside mostly in Nepal and India. Notable people with surname include: *Karn Jit Budhathoki, Nepalese Parliament member *Keshav Kumar Budhathoki, Nepalese legislative member *Prakash Budhathoki, Nepalese footballer *Saroj Budhathoki, Advocate *bijay Kumar Budhathoki, Nepalese social worker, live in Ireland. == References == Category:Nepali-language surnames
title: Budhathoki
